title: Crystal Mathis, LLC.
author: Crystal Mathis; LLC
description: Crystal Mathis is an Integrative Health Coach (CRT) & a Neuromuscular Massage Therapist (LMT) who works to help clients create sustainable, lifestyle changes.
cleaned_text: To Book Your Appointment please click one of the links below. Should you have any further questions or, would like to speak to me directly, please utilize the CONTACT ME DIALOG BOX at the bottom of the page. This type of massage therapy is indicated for: ( BY APPOINTMENT ONLY ) An Integrative Health Coach partners with individuals & guides them through overall lifestyle changes, with a focus on nutrition & well-being. This type of Health Coaching is tailored to take into account all lifestyle & health factors that may be affecting each individual.
